languages.text: "Гало окулус... Среди хладных торговцев ходит множество легенд о древнейших ксеноартефактах, утерянных среди звезд Простора Коронус и Сектора Каликсиса. Вещица, заполучив которую можно стать влиятельнее почтеннейших Навис Нобилите и обрясть богатства сродни Вольным Торговцам. Цена бессмертия..." {n}Джай подносит аквилу к губам.{/n} "Даже в моем сердце не трепещет столь алчное пламя, готовое предать Человечество и замарать собственную душу".

traits.locale_text: "Гало окулус... Среди хладных торговцев ходит множество легенд о древнейших ксено-артефактах, утерянных среди звезд Простора Коронус и Сектора Каликсида. Вещица, заполучив которую можно стать влиятельнее почтеннейших Навис Нобилите и обрясть богатства сродни Вольным Торговцам. Цена бессмертия..." {n}Джай подносит аквилу к губам.{/n} "Даже в моем сердце не трепещет столь алчное пламя, готовое предать Человечество и замарать собственную душу".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Halo Oculus... There are many legends among the Cold Traders about the ancient xeno-artefacts lost among the stars of the Koronus Expanse and the Calixis Sector. A little something that would make you more influential than the honourable Navis Nobilite and just as wealthy as the esteemed Rogue Traders. The price of immortality..." {n}Jae presses the Aquila to her lips.{/n} "Not even in my own heart does the flame of greed burn hotly enough to betray Humanity and stain my soul forever."
languages.original_text: "Гало окулус... Среди хладных торговцев ходит множество легенд о древнейших ксеноартефактах, утерянных среди звезд Простора Коронус и Сектора Каликсиса. languages.text: 「光輪の眼…闇商人たちの間では、コロヌス・エクスパンスとカリクシス星域の星々の間で失われた古代の異種族のアーティファクトについて多くの伝説が語られているの。その力を少しでも手に入れれば、最高に名誉ある航宙貴族以上の影響力を持ち、自由開拓者ほどの富を得られるという噂よ。不死身の値段は…」{n}ジェイはアクィラを唇に押し当てる。{/n}「あたしの心の中ですら、人類を裏切り、自分の魂を永遠に汚すほどのすさまじい欲の炎は燃えていないわ」
languages.original_text: "Halo Oculus... There are many legends among the Cold Traders about the ancient xeno-artefacts lost among the stars of the Koronus Expanse and the Calixis Sector. A little something that would make you more influential than the honourable Navis Nobilite and just as wealthy as the esteemed Rogue Traders. The price of immortality..." {n}Jae presses the Aquila to her lips.{/n} "Not even in my own heart does the flame of greed burn hotly enough to betray Humanity and stain my soul forever."

traits.locale_text: 「光輪の眼…闇商人たちの間では、コロヌス・エクスパンスとカリクシス星域の星々の間で失われた古代の異種族のアーティファクトについて多くの伝説が語られているの。その力を少しでも手に入れれば、最高に名誉ある航宙貴族以上の影響力を持ち、自由開拓者ほどの富を得られるという噂よ。不死身の値段は…」{n}ジェイはアクィラを唇に押し当てる。{/n}「あたしの心の中ですら、人類を裏切り、自分の魂を永遠に汚すほどのすさまじい欲の炎は燃えていないわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Halo Oculus... Corren muchas leyendas entre los Comerciantes Fríos sobre antiguos xenoartefactos perdidos entre las estrellas de la Extensión de Koronus y el sector Calixis. Una de estas cosas basta para ser más influyente que la honorable Navis Nobilite y tan rica como los estimados Comerciantes Independientes. El precio de la inmortalidad...». {n}Jae se lleva el Aquila a los labios.{/n} «Ni siquiera mi corazón es tan avaricioso como para traicionar a la Humanidad y mancillar eternamente mi alma».
languages.original_text: "Halo Oculus... There are many legends among the Cold Traders about the ancient xeno-artefacts lost among the stars of the Koronus Expanse and the Calixis Sector. A little something that would make you more influential than the honourable Navis Nobilite and just as wealthy as the esteemed Rogue Traders. The price of immortality..." {n}Jae presses the Aquila to her lips.{/n} "Not even in my own heart does the flame of greed burn hotly enough to betray Humanity and stain my soul forever."

traits.locale_text: «Halo Oculus... Corren muchas leyendas entre los Comerciantes Fríos sobre antiguos xenoartefactos perdidos entre las estrellas de la Extensión de Koronus y el sector Calixis. Una de estas cosas basta para ser más influyente que la honorable Navis Nobilite y tan rica como los estimados Comerciantes Independientes. El precio de la inmortalidad...». {n}Jae se lleva el Aquila a los labios.{/n} «Ni siquiera mi corazón es tan avaricioso como para traicionar a la Humanidad y mancillar eternamente mi alma».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “光晕之眼……这种古代异形造物散佚在科罗努斯扩区与卡利西斯星区，冷市商人之中有许多关于它们的传说。只要得到了它的一丁点碎片，就足以为你带来比高贵的导航宗族更显赫的荣耀，获得与受人尊敬的行商浪人比肩的财富。但永生的代价……”{n}婕伊将双头鹰吊坠按在唇上。{/n}“即使是我心中最炽烈的贪婪，也不足以让我为此背叛人性，令我的灵魂永远蒙辱。”
languages.original_text: "Halo Oculus... There are many legends among the Cold Traders about the ancient xeno-artefacts lost among the stars of the Koronus Expanse and the Calixis Sector. A little something that would make you more influential than the honourable Navis Nobilite and just as wealthy as the esteemed Rogue Traders. The price of immortality..." {n}Jae presses the Aquila to her lips.{/n} "Not even in my own heart does the flame of greed burn hotly enough to betray Humanity and stain my soul forever."

traits.locale_text: “光晕之眼……这种古代异形造物散佚在科罗努斯扩区与卡利西斯星区，冷市商人之中有许多关于它们的传说。只要得到了它的一丁点碎片，就足以为你带来比高贵的导航宗族更显赫的荣耀，获得与受人尊敬的行商浪人比肩的财富。但永生的代价……”{n}婕伊将双头鹰吊坠按在唇上。{/n}“即使是我心中最炽烈的贪婪，也不足以让我为此背叛人性，令我的灵魂永远蒙辱。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « L'Oculus du Halo... De nombreuses légendes circulent parmi les adeptes du Commerce Froid à propos d'anciens xéno-artefacts qui auraient été perdus dans les étoiles des Étendues de Koronus et du secteur Calixis. On dit que ces objets auraient le pouvoir de vous rendre plus influent que la respectable Navis Nobilite et plus riche que les honorables libres-marchands. Le prix de l'immortalité... {n}murmure Jae en portant son Aquila à ses lèvres.{/n} Même mon cœur n'est pas assez cupide pour me résoudre à trahir l'humanité et souiller mon âme pour l'éternité. »
languages.original_text: "Halo Oculus... There are many legends among the Cold Traders about the ancient xeno-artefacts lost among the stars of the Koronus Expanse and the Calixis Sector. A little something that would make you more influential than the honourable Navis Nobilite and just as wealthy as the esteemed Rogue Traders. The price of immortality..." {n}Jae presses the Aquila to her lips.{/n} "Not even in my own heart does the flame of greed burn hotly enough to betray Humanity and stain my soul forever."

traits.locale_text: « L'Oculus du Halo... De nombreuses légendes circulent parmi les adeptes du Commerce Froid à propos d'anciens xéno-artefacts qui auraient été perdus dans les étoiles des Étendues de Koronus et du secteur Calixis. On dit que ces objets auraient le pouvoir de vous rendre plus influent que la respectable Navis Nobilite et plus riche que les honorables libres-marchands. Le prix de l'immortalité... {n}murmure Jae en portant son Aquila à ses lèvres.{/n} Même mon cœur n'est pas assez cupide pour me résoudre à trahir l'humanité et souiller mon âme pour l'éternité. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Halo Oculus ... Es gibt unter den Kalthändlern viele Legenden über die uralten Xeno-Artefakte, die in den Sternen der Koronus-Ausdehnung und des Calixis-Sektors verloren gegangen sind. Etwas, was einem mehr Einfluss verschaffen würde als der ehrenwerten Navis Nobilite und ebenso viel Reichtum wie den angesehenen Freihändlern. Der Preis der Unsterblichkeit ..." {n}Jae presst sich den Aquila an die Lippen.{/n} "Nicht einmal in meinem eigenen Herzen brennt die Flamme der Gier heiß genug, um die Menschheit zu verraten und meine Seele für immer zu besudeln."
languages.original_text: "Halo Oculus... There are many legends among the Cold Traders about the ancient xeno-artefacts lost among the stars of the Koronus Expanse and the Calixis Sector. A little something that would make you more influential than the honourable Navis Nobilite and just as wealthy as the esteemed Rogue Traders. The price of immortality..." {n}Jae presses the Aquila to her lips.{/n} "Not even in my own heart does the flame of greed burn hotly enough to betray Humanity and stain my soul forever."

Der Preis der Unsterblichkeit ..." {n}Jae presst sich den Aquila an die Lippen.{/n} "Nicht einmal in meinem eigenen Herzen brennt die Flamme der Gier heiß genug, um die Menschheit zu verraten und meine Seele für immer zu besudeln."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hale Okulus... Koronus Enginliği'yle Calixis Sektörü'nün yıldızlarında sırra kadem basmış kadim zeno eserleri hakkında nice Soğuk Tacir efsanesi vardır. Bunlar, şerefli Navis Nobilite kadar nüfuza kavuşturup saygıdeğer Hür Tacirler kadar zengin yapacak ufak tefek şeylerdir. Ölümsüzlüğün bedeli..." {n}Jae, Çift Başlı Kartal'ı dudaklarına bastırıyor.{/n} "Benim gönlümdeki hırs bile İnsanlığa ihanet edip ruhuma ebediyen leke sürecek kadar gözümü bürümedi."
languages.original_text: "Halo Oculus... There are many legends among the Cold Traders about the ancient xeno-artefacts lost among the stars of the Koronus Expanse and the Calixis Sector. A little something that would make you more influential than the honourable Navis Nobilite and just as wealthy as the esteemed Rogue Traders. The price of immortality..." {n}Jae presses the Aquila to her lips.{/n} "Not even in my own heart does the flame of greed burn hotly enough to betray Humanity and stain my soul forever."
